options.desc: Array of objects with value and label props. The binary components will be created according to this array
examples: :options="[ { label: 'Option 1', value: 'op1' }, { label: 'Option 2', value: 'op2' }, { label: 'Option 3', value: 'op3' } ]"

type.desc: The type of input component to be used

keep-color.desc: Should the color (if specified any) be kept when input components are unticked?

left-label.desc: Label (if any specified) should be displayed on the left side of the input components

inline.desc: Show input components as inline-block rather than each having their own row
